Class Solver.Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • Solver.Block

  • public class Solver.Block
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object that represents a block. It contains methods to move a block check if the block is movable as well as calculate free blocks needed for a move (needed in solver)
    Author:
    Daniel van der Maden

        public Solver.Location[] getFreeMoves(Solver.Location direction)

        Returns:

      • movable

        Checks if there is space for this block to move in the current board
        Parameters:
        free - space needed for a move
        emptyPlaces - free spaces in current table
        Returns:
